title: Cycling Pelican
input: Generate an SVG of a pelican riding a bicycle,no text,no libraries

items.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<title>Pelican Riding a Bicycle</title>
<style>
* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}
body {
  width: 100vw;
  height: 100vh;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #87CEEB 0%, #E0F6FF 100%);
  overflow: hidden;
}
svg {
  width: 90vw;
  height: 90vh;
  max-width: 1200px;
  max-height: 900px;
}
</style>
</head>
<body>

  <line x1="200" y1="450" x2="375" y2="300" stroke="#C41E3A" stroke-width="12" stroke-linecap="round"/>
  <line x1="375" y1="300" x2="550" y2="450" stroke="#C41E3A" stroke-width="12" stroke-linecap="round"/>
  <line x1="375" y1="300" x2="375" y2="380" stroke="#C41E3A" stroke-width="12" stroke-linecap="round"/>

  <line x1="375" y1="300" x2="420" y2="250" stroke="#C41E3A" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round"/>
  <rect x="415" y="235" width="40" height="8" rx="4" fill="#8B4513"/>
  
  <circle cx="375" cy="300" r="8" fill="#666"/>
  
  <ellipse cx="430" cy="280" rx="35" cy="25" fill="#FFF" stroke="#FFD700" stroke-width="3"/>
  <ellipse cx="430" cy="200" rx="40" ry="45" fill="#FFF"/>
  <ellipse cx="430" cy="200" rx="30" ry="35" fill="#F5F5DC"/>
  
  <circle cx="420" cy="195" r="6" fill="#000"/>
  <circle cx="445" cy="195" r="6" fill="#000"/>
  
  <path d="M 460 180 Q 480 120 490 100 Q 495 80 480 75 Q 470 72 465 80 L 460 100 Q 455 120 460 180 Z" fill="#FF8C00" stroke="#D2691E" stroke-width="2"/>
  
  <path d="M 465 215 Q 475 225 490 228 Q 500 230 505 225 Q 508 220 505 215 Q 500 210 490 210 Q 475 210 465 215 Z" fill="#FF8C00" stroke="#D2691E" stroke-width="1.5"/>
  
  <ellipse cx="395" cy="340" rx="28" ry="40" fill="#FFF" stroke="#DDD" stroke-width="2"/>
  <ellipse cx="395" cy="340" rx="18" ry="30" fill="#F5F5DC"/>
  
  <ellipse cx="465" cy="340" rx="28" ry="40" fill="#FFF" stroke="#DDD" stroke-width="2"/>
  <ellipse cx="465" cy="340" rx="18" ry="30" fill="#F5F5DC"/>
  
  <path d="M 430 225 Q 410 250 395 280" stroke="#FFF" stroke-width="8" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round"/>
  <path d="M 430 225 Q 450 250 465 280" stroke="#FFF" stroke-width="8" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round"/>
  
  <path d="M 380 365 L 375 400 L 370 405 L 380 408 L 385 405 L 382 370 Z" fill="#FF8C00" stroke="#D2691E" stroke-width="1"/>
  <path d="M 410 365 L 415 400 L 410 405 L 400 408 L 395 405 L 398 370 Z" fill="#FF8C00" stroke="#D2691E" stroke-width="1"/>
  
  <path d="M 450 365 L 445 400 L 450 405 L 460 408 L 465 405 L 462 370 Z" fill="#FF8C00" stroke="#D2691E" stroke-width="1"/>
  <path d="M 480 365 L 485 400 L 480 405 L 470 408 L 465 405 L 468 370 Z" fill="#FF8C00" stroke="#D2691E" stroke-width="1"/>
  
  <path d="M 485 90 Q 500 88 510 95 Q 515 100 512 108 L 495 105 Z" fill="#FF6347" stroke="#D2691E" stroke-width="1.5"/>
