</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
<meta charset="utf-8">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,initial-scale=1">
<title>Pelican Riding a Bicycle (SVG)</title>
<style>
  html, body { margin: 0; height: 100%; background: #eef6ff; }
  .stroke { stroke: #1a1a1a; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; }
</style>
</head>
<body>
<svg viewBox="0 0 900 600" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" aria-label="Pelican riding a bicycle">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="sky" x1="0" y1="0" x2="0" y2="1">
      <stop offset="0" stop-color="#eaf5ff"/>
      <stop offset="1" stop-color="#ffffff"/>
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="ground" x1="0" y1="0" x2="0" y2="1">
      <stop offset="0" stop-color="#e7f3e7"/>
      <stop offset="1" stop-color="#d6edd6"/>
    </linearGradient>
    <radialGradient id="tireShine" cx="50%" cy="40%" r="70%">
      <stop offset="0" stop-color="#444"/>
      <stop offset="0.7" stop-color="#222"/>
      <stop offset="1" stop-color="#000"/>
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>

  <!-- Background -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="900" height="600" fill="url(#sky)"/>
  <path d="M0,470 C220,430 360,520 900,480 L900,600 L0,600 Z" fill="url(#ground)"/>

  <!-- Bicycle -->
  <g id="bike">
    <!-- Wheels -->
    <g id="rearWheel" transform="translate(320,360)">
      <circle r="72" fill="url(#tireShine)" class="stroke" stroke-width="8"/>
      <circle r="60" fill="none" stroke="#cfd8dc" stroke-width="6"/>
      <g stroke="#9aa7ad" stroke-width="2">
        <line x1="-60" y1="0" x2="60" y2="0"/>
        <line x1="0" y1="-60" x2="0" y2="60"/>
        <line x1="-42.4" y1="-42.4" x2="42.4" y2="42.4"/>
        <line x1="-42.4" y1="42.4" x2="42.4" y2="-42.4"/>
      </g>
      <circle r="8" fill="#9aa7ad" class="stroke" stroke-width="2"/>
      <!-- subtle spin -->
      <animateTransform attributeName="transform" type="rotate" from="0 0 0" to="360 0 0" dur="8s" repeatCount="indefinite" additive="sum"/>
    </g>

    <g id="frontWheel" transform="translate(600,360)">
      <circle r="72" fill="url(#tireShine)" class="stroke" stroke-width="8"/>
      <circle r="60" fill="none" stroke="#cfd8dc" stroke-width="6"/>
      <g stroke="#9aa7ad" stroke-width="2">
        <line x1="-60" y1="0" x2="60" y2="0"/>
        <line x1="0" y1="-60" x2="0" y2="60"/>
        <line x1="-42.4" y1="-42.4" x2="42.4" y2="42.4"/>
        <line x1="-42.4" y1="42.4" x2="42.4" y2="-42.4"/>
      </g>
      <circle r="8" fill="#9aa7ad" class="stroke" stroke-width="2"/>
      <!-- subtle spin -->
      <animateTransform attributeName="transform" type="rotate" from="0 0 0" to="360 0 0" dur="8s" repeatCount="indefinite" additive="sum"/>
    </g>

    <!-- Frame geometry -->
    <!-- Key points: R(320,360) F(600,360) S(400,250) H(570,260) BB(470,350) -->
    <g stroke="#3b6aa0" stroke-width="10" fill="none" class="stroke">
      <line x1="320" y1="360" x2="400" y2="250"/>  <!-- seat stay -->
      <line x1="400" y1="250" x2="570" y2="260"/>  <!-- top tube -->
      <line x1="570" y1="260" x2="470" y2="350"/>  <!-- down tube -->
      <line x1="470" y1="350" x2="320" y2="360"/>  <!-- chain stay -->
      <line x1="470" y1="350" x2="600" y2="360"/>  <!-- fork -->
    </g>

    <!-- Seat -->
    <rect x="376" y="234" width="50" height="16" rx="8" fill="#2f3b47" class="stroke" stroke-width="4"/>
    <!-- Head tube -->
    <circle cx="570" cy="260" r="8" fill="#2f3b47"/>

    <!-- Handlebar stem and bar -->
    <g stroke="#2f3b47" stroke-width="6" fill="none" class="stroke">
      <line x1="570" y1="260" x2="600" y2="230"/>
      <line x1="600" y1="230" x2="630" y2="230"/>
    </g>
    <!-- Grips -->
    <circle cx="630" cy="230" r="6" fill="#2f3b47"/>
    <circle cx="600" cy="230" r="6" fill="#2f3b47"/>

    <!-- Crankset -->
    <circle cx="470" cy="350" r="14" fill="#2f3b47" class="stroke" stroke-width="4"/>
    <!-- Chain -->
    <path d="M410,350 C450,340 490,340 530,350" fill="none" stroke="#444" stroke-width="4"/>
    <!-- Pedals -->
    <g id="pedals" transform="translate(470,350)">
      <g>
        <rect x="-40" y="-6" width="22" height="12" rx="4" fill="#2f3b47"/>
        <rect x="18" y="-6" width="22" height="12" rx="4" fill="#2f3b47"/>
        <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="18" y2="0" stroke="#2f3b47" stroke-width="6"/>
        <animateTransform attributeName="transform" type="rotate" from="0 0 0" to="360 0 0" dur="3s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
      </g>
    </g>
  </g>

  <!-- Pelican -->
  <g id="pelican" transform="translate(0,0)">
    <!-- Tail -->
    <path d="M270,320 Q250,300 255,280 Q265,295 290,305 Z" fill="#ffffff" class="stroke" stroke-width="4"/>
    <!-- Body -->
    <ellipse cx="380" cy="300" rx="130" ry="70" fill="#ffffff" class="stroke" stroke-width="4"/>
    <!-- Wing -->
    <path d="M360,290 C330,260 355,245 395,250 C415,252 435,265 445,290 C420,305 395,312 360,290 Z"
          fill="#eceff1" class="stroke" stroke-width="4"/>

    <!-- Neck -->
    <path d="M420,270 C415,300 395,310 380,300 C400,285 405,275 420,270 Z"
          fill="#ffffff" class="stroke" stroke-width="4"/>

    <!-- Head -->
    <ellipse cx="455" cy="235" rx="42" ry="34" fill="#ffffff" class="stroke" stroke-width="4"/>
    <!-- Eye -->
    <circle cx="465" cy="230" r="6" fill="#1a1a1a"/>
    <circle cx="467" cy="228" r="2.2" fill="#ffffff"/>

    <!-- Upper beak -->
    <path d="M450,230 L600,190 L596,200 L452,238 Z" fill="#f4a024" class="stroke" stroke-width="4"/>
    <!-- Lower beak + pouch -->
    <path d="M450,238 L602,220 L596,234 L455,250 L448,242 Z" fill="#f39c12" class="stroke" stroke-width="4"/>
    <!-- Beak seam -->
    <path d="M452,238 Q520,233 596,205" fill="none" stroke="#8c5e00" stroke-width="3" stroke-linecap="round"/>

    <!-- Legs -->
    <!-- Rear leg -->
    <path d="M395,340 Q400,360 425,370 Q430,372 430,380" fill="none" class="stroke" stroke="#f57f17" stroke-width="8"/>
    <!-- Front leg -->
    <path d="M450,338 Q470,360 495,372 Q500,375 500,383" fill="none" class="stroke" stroke="#f57f17" stroke-width="8"/>

    <!-- Feet on pedals -->
    <g transform="translate(425,370)">
      <path d="M0,0 l18,2 l-6,12 l-15,0 Z" fill="#f57f17" class="stroke" stroke-width="3"/>
    </g>
    <g transform="translate(495,372)">
      <path d="M0,0 l18,2 l-6,12 l-15,0 Z" fill="#f57f17" class="stroke" stroke-width="3"/>
    </g>
  </g>

  <!-- Subtle shadow under bike -->
  <ellipse cx="460" cy="440" rx="230" ry="18" fill="#000" opacity="0.06"/>
</svg>
</body>
</html>

<html lang="en">
<head>
<meta charset="utf-8">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,initial-scale=1">
<title> </title>
<style>
  :root{
    --bg1:#cde8ff;
    --bg2:#f4fbff;
    --ground:#c2d4a1;
    --tire:#2b2b2b;
    --rim:#8894a6;
    --spoke:#b8c3d6;
    --frame:#e35349;
    --accent:#1f9dbf;
    --pelican:#ffffff;
    --pelican-shade:#dfe6ee;
    --beak:#f4a736;
    --beak-dark:#d9862d;
    --eye:#1a1a1a;
    --leg:#ef8d2d;
    --wing:#72839a;
  }
  html,body{
    height:100%;
  }
  body{
    margin:0;
    background: radial-gradient(120% 100% at 50% 0%, var(--bg2) 0%, var(--bg1) 60%, #bfe0ff 100%);
    display:flex;
    align-items:center;
    justify-content:center;
  }
  .stage{
    width:min(94vw, 140vh);
    height:auto;
    max-height:94vh;
    aspect-ratio: 3 / 2;
    display:block;
    filter: drop-shadow(0 20px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.2));
  }
  @media (max-width:700px){
    .stage{ width:96vw; max-height:88vh;}
  }
</style>
</head>
<body>
<svg class="stage" viewBox="0 0 1200 800" preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid meet">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="wheelShine" x1="0" x2="1" y1="0" y2="0">
      <stop offset="0" stop-color="#444"/>
      <stop offset="0.5" stop-color="#262626"/>
      <stop offset="1" stop-color="#444"/>
    </linearGradient>
    <radialGradient id="pelicanBody" cx="40%" cy="35%" r="70%">
      <stop offset="0" stop-color="#ffffff"/>
      <stop offset="1" stop-color="#e7eef6"/>
    </radialGradient>
    <radialGradient id="beakGrad" cx="30%" cy="30%" r="80%">
      <stop offset="0" stop-color="#ffbb4f"/>
      <stop offset="1" stop-color="#e0892a"/>
    </radialGradient>
    <filter id="softShadow" x="-30%" y="-30%" width="160%" height="160%">
      <feDropShadow dx="0" dy="6" stdDeviation="6" flood-color="#000" flood-opacity="0.25"/>
    </filter>
  </defs>

  <!-- Ground -->
  <g>
    <path d="M0,640 C200,620 360,650 520,640 C740,628 960,670 1200,650 L1200,800 L0,800 Z" fill="var(--ground)" opacity="0.55"/>
    <path d="M0,665 C220,650 480,685 700,670 C900,657 1050,700 1200,690" stroke="#a4ba86" stroke-width="8" fill="none" opacity="0.5"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Bicycle -->
  <g id="bike" filter="url(#softShadow)">
    <!-- Wheels -->
    <g id="rearWheel" transform="translate(550,600)">
      <circle r="128" fill="url(#wheelShine)"/>
      <circle r="112" fill="#111"/>
      <circle r="108" fill="#f3f6fb"/>
      <g id="rearSpokes" stroke="var(--spoke)" stroke-width="3">
        <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="0" y2="-108"/>
        <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="0" y2="108" opacity="0.85"/>
        <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="-108" y2="0" opacity="0.85"/>
        <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="108" y2="0" opacity="0.85"/>
        <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="76.4" y2="76.4" opacity="0.75"/>
        <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="-76.4" y2="76.4" opacity="0.75"/>
        <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="76.4" y2="-76.4" opacity="0.75"/>
        <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="-76.4" y2="-76.4" opacity="0.75"/>
      </g>
      <circle r="12" fill="#9aa7bd"/>
      <animateTransform attributeName="transform" type="rotate" from="0 0 0" to="360 0 0" dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </g>

    <g id="frontWheel" transform="translate(850,600)">
      <circle r="128" fill="url(#wheelShine)"/>
      <circle r="112" fill="#111"/>
      <circle r="108" fill="#f3f6fb"/>
      <g id="frontSpokes" stroke="var(--spoke)" stroke-width="3">
        <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="0" y2="-108"/>
        <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="0" y2="108" opacity="0.85"/>
        <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="-108" y2="0" opacity="0.85"/>
        <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="108" y2="0" opacity="0.85"/>
        <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="76.4" y2="76.4" opacity="0.75"/>
        <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="-76.4" y2="76.4" opacity="0.75"/>
        <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="76.4" y2="-76.4" opacity="0.75"/>
        <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="-76.4" y2="-76.4" opacity="0.75"/>
      </g>
      <circle r="12" fill="#9aa7bd"/>
      <animateTransform attributeName="transform" type="rotate" from="0 0 0" to="360 0 0" dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </g>

    <!-- Frame geometry -->
    <g stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
      <!-- Chain stay and seat stay -->
      <path d="M550,600 L620,565 L550,600" stroke="var(--frame)" stroke-width="16" fill="none"/>
      <path d="M550,600 L650,490" stroke="var(--frame)" stroke-width="16" fill="none"/>
      <!-- Down tube -->
      <path d="M620,565 L800,500" stroke="var(--frame)" stroke-width="18" fill="none"/>
      <!-- Top tube -->
      <path d="M650,490 L820,460" stroke="var(--frame)" stroke-width="16" fill="none"/>
      <!-- Fork -->
      <path d="M820,460 L850,600" stroke="var(--frame)" stroke-width="16" fill="none"/>
      <!-- Seat tube -->
      <path d="M620,565 L650,490" stroke="var(--frame)" stroke-width="16" fill="none"/>
      <!-- Head tube -->
      <path d="M800,500 L820,460" stroke="var(--frame)" stroke-width="16" fill="none"/>
      <!-- Chain -->
      <ellipse cx="620" cy="565" rx="95" ry="28" fill="none" stroke="#333" stroke-width="6" opacity="0.25"/>
      <!-- Rims highlight -->
      <circle cx="550" cy="600" r="108" fill="none" stroke="var(--rim)" stroke-width="6"/>
      <circle cx="850" cy="600" r="108" fill="none" stroke="var(--rim)" stroke-width="6"/>
    </g>

    <!-- Bottom bracket / chainring and pedals -->
    <g id="crank" transform="rotate(0 620 565)">
      <circle cx="620" cy="565" r="30" fill="#2d3a54"/>
      <circle cx="620" cy="565" r="46" fill="#3b4b6c"/>
      <circle cx="620" cy="565" r="52" fill="none" stroke="#1c2538" stroke-width="6" stroke-dasharray="6 14"/>
      <!-- Crank arms -->
      <rect x="617" y="465" width="6" height="100" rx="3" fill="#1f9dbf" transform="rotate(0 620 565)"/>
      <rect x="617" y="565" width="6" height="100" rx="3" fill="#1f9dbf" transform="rotate(180 620 565)"/>
      <!-- Pedals -->
      <g transform="translate(620,470)">
        <rect x="-28" y="-10" width="56" height="20" rx="8" fill="#222"/>
        <rect x="-20" y="-6" width="40" height="12" rx="6" fill="#5b6a82"/>
      </g>
      <g transform="translate(620,660)">
        <rect x="-28" y="-10" width="56" height="20" rx="8" fill="#222"/>
        <rect x="-20" y="-6" width="40" height="12" rx="6" fill="#5b6a82"/>
      </g>
      <animateTransform attributeName="transform" type="rotate" from="0 620 565" to="360 620 565" dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </g>

    <!-- Seat -->
    <g>
      <path d="M650,490 C650,472 666,462 700,462 C730,462 745,468 755,480 C763,490 756,502 741,505 C709,510 676,505 650,490 Z" fill="#1c2538"/>
      <rect x="645" y="490" width="12" height="35" rx="6" fill="#2a3550"/>
    </g>

    <!-- Handlebar -->
    <g>
      <rect x="798" y="486" width="12" height="28" rx="6" fill="#2a3550"/>
      <path d="M804,486 C845,476 885,470 900,485 C912,496 908,512 890,512 C872,512 850,504 830,500" stroke="#2a3550" stroke-width="12" fill="none"/>
      <rect x="885" y="500" width="32" height="14" rx="7" fill="#334162"/>
    </g>
  </g>

  <!-- Pelican -->
  <g id="pelican" filter="url(#softShadow)">
    <!-- Tail -->
    <path d="M560,515 C530,500 512,515 510,530 C508,546 530,556 555,550" fill="#cfd8e6"/>
    <!-- Body -->
    <path d="M575,520 C560,540 555,575 580,600 C610,630 700,630 735,590 C770,550 740,515 705,505 C665,492 600,490 575,520 Z" fill="url(#pelicanBody)"/>
    <!-- Belly shade -->
    <path d="M590,555 C600,580 640,600 690,600 C715,600 735,590 740,570 C725,590 650,598 590,555 Z" fill="var(--pelican-shade)" opacity="0.7"/>

    <!-- Wing (slight flap) -->
    <g transform="rotate(0 640 545)">
      <path d="M610,530 C585,545 572,575 595,600 C625,635 710,630 740,605 C720,602 700,595 680,580 C660,565 638,548 610,530 Z" fill="var(--wing)" opacity="0.9"/>
      <path d="M620,540 C640,560 675,585 715,600" stroke="#55647a" stroke-width="8" stroke-linecap="round" opacity="0.5"/>
      <animateTransform attributeName="transform" type="rotate" values="-4 640 545; 4 640 545; -4 640 545" dur="2.6s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </g>

    <!-- Neck -->
    <path d="M690,505 C710,505 735,515 755,525 C770,532 775,540 776,555 C777,570 766,580 748,580 C720,580 700,560 688,540 C680,528 680,518 690,505 Z" fill="#f5f9ff"/>

    <!-- Head -->
    <g>
      <ellipse cx="770" cy="520" rx="38" ry="30" fill="#ffffff"/>
      <circle cx="786" cy="516" r="5.5" fill="var(--eye)"/>
      <circle cx="784" cy="514" r="2" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/>
    </g>

    <!-- Beak upper -->
    <path d="M760,520 C800,514 855,496 905,495 C922,494 936,498 940,506 C944,514 932,522 910,525 C860,532 815,535 765,530 Z" fill="url(#beakGrad)"/>
    <!-- Beak lower / pouch -->
    <path d="M762,530 C808,540 840,548 900,552 C916,553 930,556 933,565 C936,575 920,583 905,584 C865,586 815,575 770,556 C762,552 756,540 762,530 Z" fill="var(--beak-dark)" opacity="0.9"/>

    <!-- Legs attached toward crank -->
    <g id="legs" transform="rotate(0 620 565)">
      <!-- Left leg -->
      <path d="M640,550 L640,615" stroke="var(--leg)" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round"/>
      <!-- Left foot on upper pedal -->
      <g transform="translate(620,470)">
        <path d="M20,0 C35,0 45,8 45,15 C45,20 36,26 28,26 C10,26 0,18 0,10 C0,5 7,0 20,0 Z" fill="var(--leg)"/>
        <path d="M20,4 C30,4 36,9 36,14 C36,18 31,22 26,22 C13,22 8,16 8,11 C8,8 12,4 20,4 Z" fill="#f9b26b"/>
      </g>

      <!-- Right leg -->
      <path d="M610,550 L610,615" stroke="var(--leg)" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round"/>
      <!-- Right foot on lower pedal -->
      <g transform="translate(620,660)">
        <path d="M-20,0 C-35,0 -45,8 -45,15 C-45,20 -36,26 -28,26 C-10,26 0,18 0,10 C0,5 -7,0 -20,0 Z" fill="var(--leg)"/>
        <path d="M-20,4 C-30,4 -36,9 -36,14 C-36,18 -31,22 -26,22 C-13,22 -8,16 -8,11 C-8,8 -12,4 -20,4 Z" fill="#f9b26b"/>
      </g>

      <animateTransform attributeName="transform" type="rotate" from="0 620 565" to="360 620 565" dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </g>
  </g>

  <!-- Subtle front highlight -->
  <ellipse cx="950" cy="740" rx="220" ry="24" fill="#000" opacity="0.08"/>
</svg>
</body>
</html>

title: Perlin cosmic glow
input: You are an expert P5.js developer with expertise in generative art, mathematics (vector fields, Perlin noise), and aesthetic design. Create a visually stunning, interactive particle flow field sketch that mimics ethereal, fluid dynamics with glowing trails and cosmic vibes.

items.content:
<html>
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<title>Cosmic Flow Field</title>
<style>
html, body {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
  background: radial-gradient(circle at 20% 0%, #2b2f6d 0%, #050711 40%, #020308 100%);
  overflow: hidden;
}
canvas {
  display: block;
}
</style>
<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/p5.js/1.9.0/p5.min.js"></script>
</head>
<body>
<script>
let particles = [];
let flowScale = 0.003;
let zoff = 0;
let palette;

function setup() {
  createCanvas(windowWidth, windowHeight);
  colorMode(HSB, 360, 100, 100, 1);
  palette = [
    color(210, 70, 100, 0.9),
    color(260, 70, 100, 0.9),
    color(300, 60, 100, 0.9),
    color(190, 60, 100, 0.9),
    color(40, 90, 100, 0.9)
  ];
  blendMode(ADD);
  background(0, 0, 0, 1);
  initParticles();
}

function initParticles() {
  particles = [];
  const count = floor((windowWidth * windowHeight) * 0.0003);
  for (let i = 0; i < count; i++) {
    particles.push(new Particle());
  }
}

class Particle {
  constructor() {
    this.reset(true);
  }

  reset(first = false) {
    if (first) {
      this.pos = createVector(random(width), random(height));
    } else {
      // Respawn near mouse if on screen, else anywhere
      if (mouseX > 0 && mouseX < width && mouseY > 0 && mouseY < height && random() < 0.6) {
        const r = random(10, 60);
        const a = random(TWO_PI);
        this.pos = createVector(mouseX + cos(a) * r, mouseY + sin(a) * r);
      } else {
        this.pos = createVector(random(width), random(height));
      }
    }
    this.prev = this.pos.copy();
    this.vel = p5.Vector.random2D().mult(random(0.1, 0.6));
    this.life = random(60, 300);
    this.maxLife = this.life;
    this.weight = random(0.7, 2.4);
    this.col = random(palette);
    this.curveOffset = random(1000);
  }

  flowForce() {
    let x = this.pos.x * flowScale;
    let y = this.pos.y * flowScale;
    let n = noise(x, y, zoff + this.curveOffset);
    // Map noise to a curling angle
    let angle = n * TWO_PI * 2.5;
    // Subtle pull towards a drifting center
    const cx = width * (0.5 + 0.15 * sin(frameCount * 0.0007));
    const cy = height * (0.5 + 0.15 * cos(frameCount * 0.0005));
    const center = createVector(cx, cy);
    const toCenter = p5.Vector.sub(center, this.pos);
    const d = toCenter.mag();
    toCenter.normalize();
    const grav = constrain(map(d, 0, max(width, height) * 0.7, 0.04, 0), 0, 0.04);
    let v = p5.Vector.fromAngle(angle);
    v.mult(0.9);
    v.add(toCenter.mult(grav));
    return v;
  }

  update() {
    this.life--;
    if (this.life <= 0 || this.outOfBounds()) {
      this.reset();
      return;
    }

    this.prev.set(this.pos);
    const acc = this.flowForce();
    this.vel.add(acc);
    this.vel.limit(2.5);
    this.pos.add(this.vel);
  }

  outOfBounds() {
    const margin = 40;
    return (
      this.pos.x < -margin || this.pos.x > width + margin ||
      this.pos.y < -margin || this.pos.y > height + margin
    );
  }

  draw() {
    const t = this.life / this.maxLife;
    const alpha = pow(t, 1.2) * 0.4 + 0.1;
    const w = this.weight * (0.2 + 0.8 * (1 - pow(1 - t, 3)));

    strokeWeight(w);
    const h = (hue(this.col) + sin(frameCount * 0.001 + this.curveOffset) * 15) % 360;
    const s = saturation(this.col);
    const b = brightness(this.col);
    stroke(h, s, b, alpha);
    line(this.prev.x, this.prev.y, this.pos.x, this.pos.y);

    // Soft halo
    const haloAlpha = alpha * 0.35;
    strokeWeight(w * 4);
    stroke(h, s * 0.7, b * 0.8, haloAlpha * 0.2);
    line(this.prev.x, this.prev.y, this.pos.x, this.pos.y);
  }
}

function draw() {
  // Fade trails
  noStroke();
  fill(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
  rect(0, 0, width, height);

  // Subtle vignette
  push();
  drawingContext.save();
  let grd = drawingContext.createRadialGradient(
    width / 2, height / 2, min(width, height) * 0.15,
    width / 2, height / 2, max(width, height) * 0.6
  );
  grd.addColorStop(0, "rgba(0,0,0,0)");
  grd.addColorStop(1, "rgba(0,0,0,0.35)");
  drawingContext.fillStyle = grd;
  rect(0, 0, width, height);
  drawingContext.restore();
  pop();

  for (let p of particles) {
    p.update();
    p.draw();
  }

  // Animate flow field in time
  zoff += 0.002;
}

// Interaction: perturb field with mouse
function mouseMoved() {
  const center = createVector(mouseX, mouseY);
  for (let i = 0; i < particles.length * 0.08; i++) {
    const p = random(particles);
    const d = p5.Vector.dist(center, p.pos);
    if (d < 160) {
      const dir = p5.Vector.sub(p.pos, center).normalize();
      dir.mult(map(d, 0, 160, 4, 0.1));
      p.vel.add(dir);
    }
  }
}

function windowResized() {
  resizeCanvas(windowWidth, windowHeight);
  background(0, 0, 0, 1);
  initParticles();
}
</script>
</body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Ethereal Cosmic Flow Field</title>
    <style>
        body {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            background-color: #050505;
            overflow: hidden; /* Prevent scrollbars */
            font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif;
        }

        canvas {
            display: block; /* Removes default inline spacing */
        }

        #ui-layer {
            position: absolute;
            bottom: 30px;
            left: 30px;
            color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7);
            pointer-events: none; /* Let clicks pass through to canvas */
            z-index: 10;
        }

        h1 {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            margin: 0 0 5px 0;
            font-weight: 300;
            letter-spacing: 2px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            text-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 255, 255, 0.5);
        }

        p {
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            margin: 0;
            font-weight: 300;
            opacity: 0.8;
        }

        .highlight {
            color: #00ffff;
            font-weight: 500;
        }
    </style>
    <!-- Load P5.js from CDN -->
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/p5.js/1.6.0/p5.min.js"></script>
</head>
<body>

              <script>
        // Configuration
        const CONFIG = {
            particleCount: 4000,      // Number of particles
            noiseScale: 0.1,          // Scale of Perlin noise (lower = smoother flow)
            timeStep: 0.003,          // Speed of noise evolution
            fadeSpeed: 12,            // Background fade opacity (0-255), lower = longer trails
            maxSpeed: 4,              // Max particle speed
            colorSpeed: 0.5           // Speed of color cycling
        };

        let particles = [];
        let flowField;
        let cols, rows;
        let scl = 20; // Grid scale size
        let zoff = 0; // 3rd dimension for noise (time)
        let hueOffset = 0;

        function setup() {
            createCanvas(windowWidth, windowHeight);
            colorMode(HSB, 360, 100, 100, 100);
            background(0);
            
            // Grid setup
            cols = floor(width / scl);
            rows = floor(height / scl);
            
            // Adjust particle count based on screen size for performance
            let density = (width * height) / 1000000;
            let count = floor(CONFIG.particleCount * density);
            count = constrain(count, 1000, 6000); // Caps

            flowField = new Array(cols * rows);

            for (let i = 0; i < count; i++) {
                particles[i] = new Particle();
            }
        }

        function draw() {
            // Create the trailing effect by drawing a semi-transparent background
            // Use RGB mode temporarily for neutral fading
            colorMode(RGB);
            fill(0, 0, 0, CONFIG.fadeSpeed);
            noStroke();
            rect(0, 0, width, height);
            
            // Switch back to HSB for particles
            colorMode(HSB, 360, 100, 100, 100);
            
            // Calculate Flow Field
            let yoff = 0;
            for (let y = 0; y < rows; y++) {
                let xoff = 0;
                for (let x = 0; x < cols; x++) {
                    let index = x + y * cols;
                    
                    // 3D Perlin noise: x, y, and time (z)
                    // Angle varies 0 to 4PI for intricate swirls
                    let angle = noise(xoff, yoff, zoff) * TWO_PI * 4;
                    
                    // Create vector from angle
                    let v = p5.Vector.fromAngle(angle);
                    v.setMag(1); // Force magnitude
                    flowField[index] = v;
                    
                    xoff += CONFIG.noiseScale;
                }
                yoff += CONFIG.noiseScale;
            }
            zoff += CONFIG.timeStep;
            hueOffset += CONFIG.colorSpeed;

            // Update and Draw Particles
            // Additive blending makes overlapping particles glow
            blendMode(ADD); 
            
            for (let i = 0; i < particles.length; i++) {
                particles[i].follow(flowField);
                particles[i].update();
                particles[i].show();
                particles[i].edges();
            }
            
            blendMode(BLEND); // Reset blend mode for next frame's background
        }

        function windowResized() {
            resizeCanvas(windowWidth, windowHeight);
            background(0);
            cols = floor(width / scl);
            rows = floor(height / scl);
            // Re-init flowfield array size
            flowField = new Array(cols * rows);
            // We keep existing particles, they might just jump a bit
        }
        
        function mousePressed() {
            // Scatter effect
            for (let i = 0; i < particles.length; i++) {
                particles[i].scatter();
            }
        }

        // --- Particle Class ---
        class Particle {
            constructor() {
                this.pos = createVector(random(width), random(height));
                this.vel = createVector(0, 0);
                this.acc = createVector(0, 0);
                this.maxSpeed = random(2, CONFIG.maxSpeed);
                this.prevPos = this.pos.copy();
                
                // Individual color variance
                this.hueVar = random(-30, 30);
                // Determines how sensitive this particle is to the mouse
                this.mouseFactor = random(0.5, 2); 
            }

            follow(vectors) {
                // Find grid position
                let x = floor(this.pos.x / scl);
                let y = floor(this.pos.y / scl);
                let index = x + y * cols;
                
                // Safety check for array bounds
                if (index >= 0 && index < vectors.length && vectors[index]) {
                    let force = vectors[index];
                    this.applyForce(force);
                }

                // Interactive: Mouse Attraction/Repulsion
                let mouse = createVector(mouseX, mouseY);
                // Only interact if mouse is on screen
                if (mouseX > 0 && mouseX < width && mouseY > 0 && mouseY < height) {
                    let dir = p5.Vector.sub(mouse, this.pos);
                    let dist = dir.mag();
                    
                    if (dist < 200) {
                        dir.setMag(0.5 * this.mouseFactor); 
                        // If mouse is pressed (handled in global), we scatter. 
                        // Here we just create a gentle swirl attraction.
                        // Let's rotate the attraction vector 90 degrees for a vortex effect
                        dir.rotate(PI / 2);
                        this.applyForce(dir);
                    }
                }
            }

            applyForce(force) {
                this.acc.add(force);
            }

            update() {
                this.vel.add(this.acc);
                this.vel.limit(this.maxSpeed);
                this.pos.add(this.vel);
                this.acc.mult(0); // Reset acceleration
            }
            
            scatter() {
                let force = p5.Vector.random2D();
                force.mult(random(5, 15));
                this.applyForce(force);
            }

            show() {
                // Dynamic Color based on position and global hue
                // Map x position to a hue shift for a rainbow gradient across screen
                let h = (hueOffset + this.hueVar + map(this.pos.x, 0, width, 0, 100)) % 360;
                
                // Saturation: higher speed = whiter (less saturation)
                let s = map(this.vel.mag(), 0, this.maxSpeed, 100, 60);
                
                // Brightness: always high
                let b = 100;
                
                // Alpha: faster particles are more transparent
                let a = map(this.vel.mag(), 0, this.maxSpeed, 30, 100);

                stroke(h, s, b, a);
                strokeWeight(map(this.vel.mag(), 0, this.maxSpeed, 1, 2));
                
                // Draw line from previous position to current (creates continuous stroke)
                line(this.pos.x, this.pos.y, this.prevPos.x, this.prevPos.y);
                
                this.updatePrev();
            }

            updatePrev() {
                this.prevPos.x = this.pos.x;
                this.prevPos.y = this.pos.y;
            }

            edges() {
                let wrapped = false;
                if (this.pos.x > width) {
                    this.pos.x = 0;
                    wrapped = true;
                }
                if (this.pos.x < 0) {
                    this.pos.x = width;
                    wrapped = true;
                }
                if (this.pos.y > height) {
                    this.pos.y = 0;
                    wrapped = true;
                }
                if (this.pos.y < 0) {
                    this.pos.y = height;
                    wrapped = true;
                }
                
                if (wrapped) {
                    this.updatePrev(); // Prevent drawing a line across the screen
                }
            }
        }
    </script>
</body>
</html>

<html>
<head>
<title>Ethereal Particle Flow Field</title>
<style>
body {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  overflow: hidden;
  background: #000;
  font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
}
canvas {
  display: block;
}
</style>
</head>
<body>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/p5@1.4.0/lib/p5.js"></script>
<script>
let particles = [];
let flowField = [];
let cols, rows;
let inc = 0.1;
let scl = 20;
let zoff = 0;

class Particle {
  constructor() {
    this.pos = createVector(random(width), random(height));
    this.vel = createVector(0, 0);
    this.acc = createVector(0, 0);
    this.maxSpeed = 2;
    this.history = [];
    this.life = 255;
  }

  update() {
    let x = floor(this.pos.x / scl);
    let y = floor(this.pos.y / scl);
    let index = x + y * cols;
    if (index >= 0 && index < flowField.length) {
      this.acc.add(flowField[index]);
    }

    this.vel.add(this.acc);
    this.vel.limit(this.maxSpeed);
    this.pos.add(this.vel);
    this.acc.mult(0);

    this.history.push(this.pos.copy());
    if (this.history.length > 100) {
      this.history.splice(0, 1);
    }

    if (this.pos.x > width || this.pos.x < 0 || this.pos.y > height || this.pos.y < 0) {
      this.pos.x = random(width);
      this.pos.y = random(height);
      this.history = [];
    }
  }

  show() {
    stroke(255, 255, 255, this.life);
    strokeWeight(1);
    noFill();
    beginShape();
    for (let i = 0; i < this.history.length; i++) {
      let alpha = map(i, 0, this.history.length, 0, this.life);
      stroke(255, 100, 150, alpha); // Cosmic pinkish glow
      vertex(this.history[i].x, this.history[i].y);
    }
    endShape();

    // Glowing particle head
    fill(255, 200, 200, 150);
    noStroke();
    ellipse(this.pos.x, this.pos.y, 4, 4);
  }
}

function setup() {
  createCanvas(windowWidth, windowHeight);
  cols = floor(width / scl);
  rows = floor(height / scl);
  flowField = new Array(cols * rows);

  for (let i = 0; i < 500; i++) {
    particles[i] = new Particle();
  }

  background(0);
}

function draw() {
  background(0, 10); // Slight fade for trails

  let yoff = 0;
  for (let y = 0; y < rows; y++) {
    let xoff = 0;
    for (let x = 0; x < cols; x++) {
      let index = x + y * cols;
      let angle = noise(xoff, yoff, zoff) * TWO_PI * 4;
      let v = p5.Vector.fromAngle(angle);
      v.setMag(0.5);
      flowField[index] = v;
      xoff += inc;
    }
    yoff += inc;
  }
  zoff += 0.01;

  for (let p of particles) {
    p.update();
    p.show();
  }

  // Interactive: Mouse attracts particles slightly
  if (mouseIsPressed) {
    for (let p of particles) {
      let mouseForce = createVector(mouseX, mouseY);
      mouseForce.sub(p.pos);
      mouseForce.setMag(0.1);
      p.acc.add(mouseForce);
    }
  }
}

function windowResized() {
  resizeCanvas(windowWidth, windowHeight);
  cols = floor(width / scl);
  rows = floor(height / scl);
  flowField = new Array(cols * rows);
}
</script>
</body>
</html>

title: Fireworks
input: A fully automatic, realistic fireworks animation, no libraries, no text, no clicks

items.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <title>Fireworks</title>
  <style>
    * {
      margin: 0;
      padding: 0;
      box-sizing: border-box;
    }
    
    body {
      overflow: hidden;
      background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #0a0a15 0%, #1a1a2e 50%, #16213e 100%);
      min-height: 100vh;
    }
    
    canvas {
      display: block;
      width: 100vw;
      height: 100vh;
    }
  </style>
</head>
<body>
  <canvas id="fireworks"></canvas>
  
  <script>
    const canvas = document.getElementById('fireworks');
    const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
    
    let width, height;
    
    function resize() {
      width = canvas.width = window.innerWidth;
      height = canvas.height = window.innerHeight;
    }
    
    resize();
    window.addEventListener('resize', resize);
    
    const particles = [];
    const rockets = [];
    const trails = [];
    
    class Trail {
      constructor(x, y, color) {
        this.x = x;
        this.y = y;
        this.color = color;
        this.alpha = 0.5;
        this.size = 2;
      }
      
      update() {
        this.alpha -= 0.02;
        this.size *= 0.95;
      }
      
      draw() {
        ctx.save();
        ctx.globalAlpha = this.alpha;
        ctx.fillStyle = this.color;
        ctx.beginPath();
        ctx.arc(this.x, this.y, this.size, 0, Math.PI * 2);
        ctx.fill();
        ctx.restore();
      }
    }
    
    class Rocket {
      constructor() {
        this.x = Math.random() * width * 0.6 + width * 0.2;
        this.y = height;
        this.targetY = Math.random() * height * 0.4 + height * 0.1;
        this.speed = 3 + Math.random() * 2;
        this.angle = -Math.PI / 2 + (Math.random() - 0.5) * 0.3;
        this.vx = Math.cos(this.angle) * this.speed;
        this.vy = Math.sin(this.angle) * this.speed;
        this.trail = [];
        this.exploded = false;
        this.color = `hsl(${Math.random() * 60 + 20}, 100%, 70%)`;
        this.trailTimer = 0;
      }
      
      update() {
        this.vy += 0.02;
        this.x += this.vx;
        this.y += this.vy;
        
        this.trailTimer++;
        if (this.trailTimer % 2 === 0) {
          trails.push(new Trail(this.x, this.y, this.color));
        }
        
        if (this.y <= this.targetY || this.vy >= 0) {
          this.explode();
          return true;
        }
        return false;
      }
      
      explode() {
        const particleCount = 80 + Math.floor(Math.random() * 60);
        const hue = Math.random() * 360;
        const type = Math.floor(Math.random() * 5);
        
        for (let i = 0; i < particleCount; i++) {
          let angle, speed, color;
          
          switch(type) {
            case 0: // Spherical
              angle = Math.random() * Math.PI * 2;
              speed = 2 + Math.random() * 4;
              color = `hsl(${hue + Math.random() * 30}, 100%, ${50 + Math.random() * 30}%)`;
              break;
            case 1: // Ring
              angle = (i / particleCount) * Math.PI * 2;
              speed = 4 + Math.random() * 0.5;
              color = `hsl(${hue}, 100%, ${60 + Math.random() * 20}%)`;
              break;
            case 2: // Multi-color
              angle = Math.random() * Math.PI * 2;
              speed = 2 + Math.random() * 4;
              color = `hsl(${(hue + i * 3) % 360}, 100%, ${50 + Math.random() * 30}%)`;
              break;
            case 3: // Willow
              angle = Math.random() * Math.PI * 2;
              speed = 1 + Math.random() * 3;
              color = `hsl(${40 + Math.random() * 20}, 100%, ${70 + Math.random() * 20}%)`;
              break;
            case 4: // Chrysanthemum
              angle = (i / particleCount) * Math.PI * 2 + Math.random() * 0.2;
              speed = 3 + Math.random() * 3;
              color = `hsl(${hue + Math.random() * 60 - 30}, 100%, ${50 + Math.random() * 40}%)`;
              break;
          }
          
          particles.push(new Particle(
            this.x, 
            this.y, 
            Math.cos(angle) * speed,
            Math.sin(angle) * speed,
            color,
            type
          ));
        }
        
        // Add sparkles
        for (let i = 0; i < 30; i++) {
          const angle = Math.random() * Math.PI * 2;
          const speed = 1 + Math.random() * 6;
          particles.push(new Particle(
            this.x,
            this.y,
            Math.cos(angle) * speed,
            Math.sin(angle) * speed,
            '#ffffff',
            -1,
            true
          ));
        }
      }
      
      draw() {
        ctx.save();
        ctx.fillStyle = this.color;
        ctx.shadowColor = this.color;
        ctx.shadowBlur = 10;
        ctx.beginPath();
        ctx.arc(this.x, this.y, 3, 0, Math.PI * 2);
        ctx.fill();
        ctx.restore();
      }
    }
    
    class Particle {
      constructor(x, y, vx, vy, color, type, isSpark = false) {
        this.x = x;
        this.y = y;
        this.vx = vx;
        this.vy = vy;
        this.color = color;
        this.alpha = 1;
        this.decay = 0.008 + Math.random() * 0.008;
        this.gravity = type === 3 ? 0.02 : 0.04;
        this.friction = type === 3 ? 0.99 : 0.98;
        this.size = isSpark ? 1 + Math.random() : 2 + Math.random() * 2;
        this.isSpark = isSpark;
        this.twinkle = Math.random();
        this.type = type;
        this.trailTimer = 0;
      }
      
      update() {
        this.vx *= this.friction;
        this.vy *= this.friction;
        this.vy += this.gravity;
        this.x += this.vx;
        this.y += this.vy;
        this.alpha -= this.decay;
        
        if (!this.isSpark && this.alpha > 0.3) {
          this.trailTimer++;
          if (this.trailTimer % 3 === 0) {
            trails.push(new Trail(this.x, this.y, this.color));
          }
        }
        
        this.twinkle += 0.1;
      }
      
      draw() {
        const twinkleFactor = this.isSpark ? 0.5 + Math.sin(this.twinkle) * 0.5 : 1;
        
        ctx.save();
        ctx.globalAlpha = this.alpha * twinkleFactor;
        ctx.fillStyle = this.color;
        ctx.shadowColor = this.color;
        ctx.shadowBlur = this.isSpark ? 5 : 15;
        ctx.beginPath();
        ctx.arc(this.x, this.y, this.size * (this.isSpark ? twinkleFactor : 1), 0, Math.PI * 2);
        ctx.fill();
        ctx.restore();
      }
    }
    
    // Stars background
    const stars = [];
    for (let i = 0; i < 200; i++) {
      stars.push({
        x: Math.random() * width,
        y: Math.random() * height * 0.7,
        size: Math.random() * 1.5,
        twinkle: Math.random() * Math.PI * 2,
        speed: 0.02 + Math.random() * 0.03
      });
    }
    
    function drawStars() {
      stars.forEach(star => {
        star.twinkle += star.speed;
        const alpha = 0.3 + Math.sin(star.twinkle) * 0.3;
        ctx.save();
        ctx.globalAlpha = alpha;
        ctx.fillStyle = '#ffffff';
        ctx.beginPath();
        ctx.arc(star.x, star.y, star.size, 0, Math.PI * 2);
        ctx.fill();
        ctx.restore();
      });
    }
    
    function drawCityline() {
      ctx.fillStyle = '#0a0a12';
      
      const buildingData = [
        { x: 0, w: 0.05, h: 0.15 },
        { x: 0.04, w: 0.03, h: 0.2 },
        { x: 0.06, w: 0.04, h: 0.12 },
        { x: 0.1, w: 0.02, h: 0.25 },
        { x: 0.11, w: 0.04, h: 0.18 },
        { x: 0.15, w: 0.05, h: 0.22 },
        { x: 0.19, w: 0.03, h: 0.14 },
        { x: 0.22, w: 0.04, h: 0.28 },
        { x: 0.25, w: 0.03, h: 0.16 },
        { x: 0.28, w: 0.05, h: 0.2 },
        { x: 0.32, w: 0.02, h: 0.35 },
        { x: 0.34, w: 0.04, h: 0.18 },
        { x: 0.38, w: 0.06, h: 0.24 },
        { x: 0.43, w: 0.03, h: 0.15 },
        { x: 0.46, w: 0.04, h: 0.3 },
        { x: 0.49, w: 0.03, h: 0.19 },
        { x: 0.52, w: 0.05, h: 0.22 },
        { x: 0.56, w: 0.02, h: 0.4 },
        { x: 0.58, w: 0.04, h: 0.17 },
        { x: 0.62, w: 0.05, h: 0.26 },
        { x: 0.66, w: 0.03, h: 0.14 },
        { x: 0.69, w: 0.04, h: 0.32 },
        { x: 0.72, w: 0.03, h: 0.18 },
        { x: 0.75, w: 0.05, h: 0.21 },
        { x: 0.79, w: 0.02, h: 0.28 },
        { x: 0.81, w: 0.04, h: 0.16 },
        { x: 0.85, w: 0.05, h: 0.23 },
        { x: 0.89, w: 0.03, h: 0.19 },
        { x: 0.92, w: 0.04, h: 0.25 },
        { x: 0.95, w: 0.05, h: 0.15 }
      ];
      
      buildingData.forEach(b => {
        const x = b.x * width;
        const w = b.w * width;
        const h = b.h * height;
        ctx.fillRect(x, height - h, w, h);
        
        // Windows
        ctx.fillStyle = 'rgba(255, 200, 100, 0.3)';
        const windowSize = 3;
        const windowGap = 8;
        for (let wy = height - h + 10; wy < height - 10; wy += windowGap) {
          for (let wx = x + 5; wx < x + w - 5; wx += windowGap) {
            if (Math.random() > 0.3) {
              ctx.fillRect(wx, wy, windowSize, windowSize);
            }
          }
        }
        ctx.fillStyle = '#0a0a12';
      });
    }
    
    let lastLaunch = 0;
    let launchInterval = 800;
    
    function animate(timestamp) {
      // Fade effect for trails
      ctx.fillStyle = 'rgba(10, 10, 21, 0.15)';
      ctx.fillRect(0, 0, width, height);
      
      drawStars();
      
      // Auto launch rockets
      if (timestamp - lastLaunch > launchInterval) {
        const count = Math.random() > 0.7 ? 2 : 1;
        for (let i = 0; i < count; i++) {
          rockets.push(new Rocket());
        }
        lastLaunch = timestamp;
        launchInterval = 500 + Math.random() * 1500;
      }
      
      // Update and draw trails
      for (let i = trails.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        trails[i].update();
        trails[i].draw();
        if (trails[i].alpha <= 0) {
          trails.splice(i, 1);
        }
      }
      
      // Update and draw rockets
      for (let i = rockets.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        if (rockets[i].update()) {
          rockets.splice(i, 1);
        } else {
          rockets[i].draw();
        }
      }
      
      // Update and draw particles
      for (let i = particles.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        particles[i].update();
        particles[i].draw();
        if (particles[i].alpha <= 0) {
          particles.splice(i, 1);
        }
      }
      
      drawCityline();
      
      requestAnimationFrame(animate);
    }
    
    // Initial background
    ctx.fillStyle = '#0a0a15';
    ctx.fillRect(0, 0, width, height);
    
    requestAnimationFrame(animate);
  </script>
</body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Fireworks</title>
    <style>
        body {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            background: #000;
            overflow: hidden;
            width: 100vw;
            height: 100vh;
            /* Prevent touch actions to ensure "no click" feeling, pure visual */
            touch-action: none; 
            user-select: none;
        }

        canvas {
            display: block;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <canvas id="canvas"></canvas>

    <script>
        // Setup basic canvas variables
        const canvas = document.getElementById('canvas');
        const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
        
        let w, h;
        
        // Update dimensions context
        function resize() {
            w = canvas.width = window.innerWidth;
            h = canvas.height = window.innerHeight;
        }
        
        window.addEventListener('resize', resize);
        resize();

        // Physics and animation constants
        const gravity = 0.05; 
        const friction = 0.96; // Drag to slow particles down
        const particlesPerExplosion = 80; // Defines density of explosion
        
        // lists
        const fireworks = [];
        const particles = [];
        
        // Utility
        function random(min, max) {
            return Math.random() * (max - min) + min;
        }

        // Classes
        class Firework {
            constructor(sx, sy, tx, ty, hue) {
                this.x = sx;
                this.y = sy;
                this.sx = sx;
                this.sy = sy;
                this.tx = tx;
                this.ty = ty;
                
                // Calculate distance and angle to target
                this.distanceToTarget = Math.sqrt(Math.pow(tx - sx, 2) + Math.pow(ty - sy, 2));
                this.distanceTraveled = 0;
                
                // Basic coordinates for drawing the trail
                this.coordinates = [];
                this.coordinateCount = 3;
                while(this.coordinateCount--) {
                    this.coordinates.push([this.x, this.y]);
                }
                
                this.angle = Math.atan2(ty - sy, tx - sx);
                this.speed = 2;
                this.acceleration = 1.05;
                this.brightness = random(50, 70);
                this.hue = hue;
                this.targetRadius = 1;
            }
            
            update(index) {
                // accelerate
                this.speed *= this.acceleration;
                
                // get current velocities
                const vx = Math.cos(this.angle) * this.speed;
                const vy = Math.sin(this.angle) * this.speed;
                
                // distance traveled this frame
                this.distanceTraveled = Math.sqrt(Math.pow(this.sx - this.x, 2) + Math.pow(this.sy - this.y, 2));
                
                // update coordinate history (for trail effect)
                this.coordinates.pop();
                this.coordinates.unshift([this.x, this.y]);
                
                // check if reached target
                if(this.distanceTraveled >= this.distanceToTarget) {
                    createParticles(this.tx, this.ty, this.hue);
                    fireworks.splice(index, 1);
                } else {
                    this.x += vx;
                    this.y += vy;
                }
            }
            
            draw() {
                ctx.beginPath();
                // Move to the last coordinate in history
                ctx.moveTo(this.coordinates[this.coordinates.length - 1][0], this.coordinates[this.coordinates.length - 1][1]);
                ctx.lineTo(this.x, this.y);
                ctx.strokeStyle = 'hsl(' + this.hue + ', 100%, ' + this.brightness + '%)';
                ctx.stroke();
            }
        }

        class Particle {
            constructor(x, y, hue) {
                this.x = x;
                this.y = y;
                this.coordinates = [];
                this.coordinateCount = 5;
                while(this.coordinateCount--) {
                    this.coordinates.push([this.x, this.y]);
                }
                
                // Random explosion angle
                const angle = random(0, Math.PI * 2);
                const speed = random(1, 10);
                
                this.vx = Math.cos(angle) * speed;
                this.vy = Math.sin(angle) * speed;
                
                this.friction = friction;
                this.gravity = gravity;
                
                this.hue = random(hue - 20, hue + 20);
                this.brightness = random(50, 80);
                this.alpha = 1;
                this.decay = random(0.015, 0.03); // How fast it fades
            }
            
            update(index) {
                // update last coordinates
                this.coordinates.pop();
                this.coordinates.unshift([this.x, this.y]);
                
                // physics
                this.vx *= this.friction;
                this.vy *= this.friction;
                this.vy += this.gravity;
                
                this.x += this.vx;
                this.y += this.vy;
                
                // fade out
                this.alpha -= this.decay;
                
                if(this.alpha <= this.decay) {
                    particles.splice(index, 1);
                }
            }
            
            draw() {
                ctx.beginPath();
                ctx.moveTo(this.coordinates[this.coordinates.length - 1][0], this.coordinates[this.coordinates.length - 1][1]);
                ctx.lineTo(this.x, this.y);
                ctx.strokeStyle = 'hsla(' + this.hue + ', 100%, ' + this.brightness + '%, ' + this.alpha + ')';
                ctx.stroke();
            }
        }
        
        function createParticles(x, y, hue) {
            for(let i = 0; i < particlesPerExplosion; i++) {
                particles.push(new Particle(x, y, hue));
            }
        }
        
        // Main Loop state
        let timerTotal = 40; // Rate of launch 
        let timerTick = 0;
        let hue = 120;

        function loop() {
            requestAnimationFrame(loop);
            
            hue += 0.5;
            
            // Creates the trail effect by painting over the previous frame with low opacity
            ctx.globalCompositeOperation = 'source-over';
            ctx.fillStyle = 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15)'; // The 0.15 controls global trail length
            ctx.fillRect(0, 0, w, h);
            
            // Use 'lighter' for bright, glowing light mixing
            ctx.globalCompositeOperation = 'lighter';
            
            // Draw Fireworks (Rockets)
            let i = fireworks.length;
            while(i--) {
                fireworks[i].draw();
                fireworks[i].update(i);
            }
            
            // Draw Particles (Explosions)
            let j = particles.length;
            while(j--) {
                particles[j].draw();
                particles[j].update(j);
            }
            
            // Launch mechanism
            if(timerTick >= timerTotal) {
                // Launch a new firework from bottom center-ish to random upper area
                const startX = w / 2;
                const startY = h;
                const targetX = random(w/4, 3*w/4); // Keep within middle area
                const targetY = random(0, h/2);
                
                fireworks.push(new Firework(startX, startY, targetX, targetY, hue));
                
                // Reset timer, add some randomness to rhythm
                timerTick = 0;
                timerTotal = random(20, 50); 
            } else {
                timerTick++;
            }
            
            // Occasional double-launch for variety
            if (Math.random() < 0.005) {
                 const startX = random(w/3, 2*w/3);
                 const targetX = random(0, w);
                 const targetY = random(0, h/3);
                 fireworks.push(new Firework(startX, h, targetX, targetY, random(0, 360)));
            }
        }
        
        // Start
        loop();
    </script>
</body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<title>Fireworks</title>
<style>
* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
  width: 100vw;
  height: 100vh;
  overflow: hidden;
  background: radial-gradient(ellipse at bottom, #1b2735 0%, #090a0f 100%);
}

canvas {
  display: block;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}
</style>
</head>
<body>
<canvas id="fireworks"></canvas>

<script>
const canvas = document.getElementById('fireworks');
const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');

canvas.width = window.innerWidth;
canvas.height = window.innerHeight;

window.addEventListener('resize', () => {
  canvas.width = window.innerWidth;
  canvas.height = window.innerHeight;
});

class Particle {
  constructor(x, y, color, velocity, gravity = 0.05, friction = 0.98) {
    this.x = x;
    this.y = y;
    this.color = color;
    this.velocity = velocity;
    this.gravity = gravity;
    this.friction = friction;
    this.alpha = 1;
    this.decay = Math.random() * 0.02 + 0.01;
    this.size = Math.random() * 3 + 1;
  }

  update() {
    this.velocity.x *= this.friction;
    this.velocity.y *= this.friction;
    this.velocity.y += this.gravity;
    this.x += this.velocity.x;
    this.y += this.velocity.y;
    this.alpha -= this.decay;
  }

  draw() {
    ctx.save();
    ctx.globalAlpha = this.alpha;
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(this.x, this.y, this.size, 0, Math.PI * 2);
    ctx.fillStyle = this.color;
    ctx.fill();
    
    // Glow effect
    ctx.globalAlpha = this.alpha * 0.3;
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(this.x, this.y, this.size * 2, 0, Math.PI * 2);
    ctx.fillStyle = this.color;
    ctx.fill();
    ctx.restore();
  }
}

class Trail {
  constructor(x, y, targetY, color) {
    this.x = x;
    this.y = y;
    this.targetY = targetY;
    this.color = color;
    this.velocity = {
      x: (Math.random() - 0.5) * 2,
      y: -8 - Math.random() * 4
    };
    this.alpha = 1;
    this.particles = [];
  }

  update() {
    this.velocity.y += 0.1;
    this.x += this.velocity.x;
    this.y += this.velocity.y;
    
    // Create trail particles
    if (Math.random() < 0.3) {
      this.particles.push({
        x: this.x,
        y: this.y,
        alpha: 1,
        size: Math.random() * 2 + 1
      });
    }
    
    // Update trail particles
    this.particles = this.particles.filter(p => {
      p.alpha -= 0.05;
      return p.alpha > 0;
    });
    
    return this.y <= this.targetY;
  }

  draw() {
    // Draw trail
    this.particles.forEach(p => {
      ctx.save();
      ctx.globalAlpha = p.alpha;
      ctx.beginPath();
      ctx.arc(p.x, p.y, p.size, 0, Math.PI * 2);
      ctx.fillStyle = this.color;
      ctx.fill();
      ctx.restore();
    });
    
    // Draw main rocket
    ctx.save();
    ctx.globalAlpha = this.alpha;
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(this.x, this.y, 3, 0, Math.PI * 2);
    ctx.fillStyle = this.color;
    ctx.fill();
    ctx.restore();
  }
}

class Firework {
  constructor(x, y) {
    this.x = x;
    this.y = y;
    this.particles = [];
    this.exploded = false;
    
    const hue = Math.random() * 360;
    this.color = `hsl(${hue}, 100%, 60%)`;
    
    const targetY = canvas.height * 0.2 + Math.random() * canvas.height * 0.3;
    this.trail = new Trail(x, canvas.height, targetY, this.color);
  }

  explode() {
    const particleCount = 80 + Math.floor(Math.random() * 120);
    const angleStep = (Math.PI * 2) / particleCount;
    
    const colors = [
      this.color,
      `hsl(${(parseInt(this.color.match(/\d+/)[0]) + 30) % 360}, 100%, 60%)`,
      `hsl(${(parseInt(this.color.match(/\d+/)[0]) + 60) % 360}, 100%, 70%)`
    ];
    
    for (let i = 0; i < particleCount; i++) {
      const angle = angleStep * i + (Math.random() - 0.5) * 0.5;
      const speed = 2 + Math.random() * 6;
      const color = colors[Math.floor(Math.random() * colors.length)];
      
      this.particles.push(new Particle(
        this.trail.x,
        this.trail.y,
        color,
        {
          x: Math.cos(angle) * speed,
          y: Math.sin(angle) * speed
        }
      ));
    }
    
    // Add some extra sparkles
    for (let i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
      const angle = Math.random() * Math.PI * 2;
      const speed = Math.random() * 3;
      
      this.particles.push(new Particle(
        this.trail.x,
        this.trail.y,
        'white',
        {
          x: Math.cos(angle) * speed,
          y: Math.sin(angle) * speed
        },
        0.08,
        0.96
      ));
    }
    
    this.exploded = true;
  }

  update() {
    if (!this.exploded) {
      const reachedTarget = this.trail.update();
      if (reachedTarget) {
        this.explode();
      }
    } else {
      this.particles.forEach(p => p.update());
      this.particles = this.particles.filter(p => p.alpha > 0);
    }
  }

  draw() {
    if (!this.exploded) {
      this.trail.draw();
    } else {
      this.particles.forEach(p => p.draw());
    }
  }

  isDone() {
    return this.exploded && this.particles.length === 0;
  }
}

const fireworks = [];
let lastLaunch = 0;

function animate(currentTime) {
  requestAnimationFrame(animate);
  
  ctx.fillStyle = 'rgba(9, 10, 15, 0.15)';
  ctx.fillRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
  
  // Launch new fireworks
  if (currentTime - lastLaunch > 400 + Math.random() * 800) {
    const x = canvas.width * 0.2 + Math.random() * canvas.width * 0.6;
    fireworks.push(new Firework(x, canvas.height));
    lastLaunch = currentTime;
  }
  
  // Update and draw fireworks
  fireworks.forEach((fw, index) => {
    fw.update();
    fw.draw();
    
    if (fw.isDone()) {
      fireworks.splice(index, 1);
    }
  });
}

animate(0);
</script>
</body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Fireworks Animation</title>
    <style>
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        
        body {
            overflow: hidden;
            background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #0a0e27 0%, #1a1f3a 50%, #2a2f4a 100%);
        }
        
        canvas {
            display: block;
            width: 100vw;
            height: 100vh;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <canvas id="canvas"></canvas>
    
    <script>
        const canvas = document.getElementById('canvas');
        const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
        
        let width = window.innerWidth;
        let height = window.innerHeight;
        
        canvas.width = width;
        canvas.height = height;
        
        window.addEventListener('resize', () => {
            width = window.innerWidth;
            height = window.innerHeight;
            canvas.width = width;
            canvas.height = height;
        });
        
        class Particle {
            constructor(x, y, vx, vy, color, size, type = 'normal') {
                this.x = x;
                this.y = y;
                this.vx = vx;
                this.vy = vy;
                this.color = color;
                this.size = size;
                this.alpha = 1;
                this.decay = Math.random() * 0.015 + 0.005;
                this.type = type;
                this.trail = [];
                this.maxTrailLength = type === 'rocket' ? 20 : 5;
                this.gravity = type === 'rocket' ? 0.1 : 0.05;
                this.sparkle = Math.random() > 0.8;
                this.sparklePhase = Math.random() * Math.PI * 2;
            }
            
            update() {
                this.trail.push({ x: this.x, y: this.y, alpha: this.alpha });
                if (this.trail.length > this.maxTrailLength) {
                    this.trail.shift();
                }
                
                this.x += this.vx;
                this.y += this.vy;
                this.vy += this.gravity;
                this.vx *= 0.99;
                this.vy *= 0.99;
                this.alpha -= this.decay;
                
                if (this.sparkle) {
                    this.sparklePhase += 0.3;
                }
            }
            
            draw() {
                // Draw trail
                ctx.save();
                this.trail.forEach((point, index) => {
                    const trailAlpha = (index / this.trail.length) * this.alpha * 0.5;
                    ctx.globalAlpha = trailAlpha;
                    ctx.fillStyle = this.color;
                    ctx.beginPath();
                    ctx.arc(point.x, point.y, this.size * (index / this.trail.length), 0, Math.PI * 2);
                    ctx.fill();
                });
                ctx.restore();
                
                // Draw particle with glow effect
                ctx.save();
                ctx.globalAlpha = this.alpha;
                
                // Outer glow
                const gradient = ctx.createRadialGradient(this.x, this.y, 0, this.x, this.y, this.size * 3);
                gradient.addColorStop(0, this.color);
                gradient.addColorStop(0.4, this.color);
                gradient.addColorStop(1, 'transparent');
                
                ctx.fillStyle = gradient;
                ctx.beginPath();
                ctx.arc(this.x, this.y, this.size * 3, 0, Math.PI * 2);
                ctx.fill();
                
                // Core
                ctx.fillStyle = this.sparkle && Math.sin(this.sparklePhase) > 0 ? '#ffffff' : this.color;
                ctx.beginPath();
                ctx.arc(this.x, this.y, this.size, 0, Math.PI * 2);
                ctx.fill();
                
                ctx.restore();
            }
            
            isDead() {
                return this.alpha <= 0;
            }
        }
        
        class Firework {
            constructor(x, targetY, color, pattern = 'sphere') {
                this.x = x;
                this.y = height;
                this.targetY = targetY;
                this.color = color;
                this.pattern = pattern;
                this.speed = Math.random() * 3 + 12;
                this.exploded = false;
                this.particles = [];
                
                // Launch rocket
                const angle = Math.atan2(targetY - height, 0);
                this.rocket = new Particle(
                    x,
                    height,
                    Math.random() * 2 - 1,
                    -this.speed,
                    color,
                    2,
                    'rocket'
                );
            }
            
            explode() {
                this.exploded = true;
                const particleCount = Math.random() * 100 + 150;
                const colors = this.generateColorPalette(this.color);
                
                for (let i = 0; i < particleCount; i++) {
                    let vx, vy;
                    const color = colors[Math.floor(Math.random() * colors.length)];
                    const size = Math.random() * 2 + 0.5;
                    
                    switch(this.pattern) {
                        case 'sphere':
                            const angle = (Math.PI * 2 / particleCount) * i;
                            const velocity = Math.random() * 5 + 3;
                            vx = Math.cos(angle) * velocity;
                            vy = Math.sin(angle) * velocity;
                            break;
                            
                        case 'ring':
                            const ringAngle = (Math.PI * 2 / particleCount) * i;
                            const ringVelocity = Math.random() * 2 + 5;
                            vx = Math.cos(ringAngle) * ringVelocity;
                            vy = Math.sin(ringAngle) * ringVelocity;
                            break;
                            
                        case 'heart':
                            const t = (Math.PI * 2 / particleCount) * i;
                            const heartScale = 4;
                            vx = heartScale * 16 * Math.pow(Math.sin(t), 3) / particleCount * 10;
                            vy = -heartScale * (13 * Math.cos(t) - 5 * Math.cos(2*t) - 2 * Math.cos(3*t) - Math.cos(4*t)) / particleCount * 10;
                            break;
                            
                        case 'star':
                            const starAngle = (Math.PI * 2 / particleCount) * i;
                            const starRadius = i % 2 === 0 ? 5 : 2;
                            vx = Math.cos(starAngle) * starRadius;
                            vy = Math.sin(starAngle) * starRadius;
                            break;
                            
                        case 'willow':
                            const willowAngle = (Math.PI * 2 / particleCount) * i;
                            const willowVelocity = Math.random() * 3 + 2;
                            vx = Math.cos(willowAngle) * willowVelocity;
                            vy = Math.sin(willowAngle) * willowVelocity - 2;
                            break;
                            
                        default:
                            const defaultAngle = (Math.PI * 2 / particleCount) * i;
                            const defaultVelocity = Math.random() * 5 + 3;
                            vx = Math.cos(defaultAngle) * defaultVelocity;
                            vy = Math.sin(defaultAngle) * defaultVelocity;
                    }
                    
                    this.particles.push(new Particle(this.x, this.y, vx, vy, color, size));
                }
                
                // Add extra sparkles
                for (let i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
                    const angle = Math.random() * Math.PI * 2;
                    const velocity = Math.random() * 8 + 2;
                    const vx = Math.cos(angle) * velocity;
                    const vy = Math.sin(angle) * velocity;
                    this.particles.push(new Particle(this.x, this.y, vx, vy, '#ffffff', 1));
                }
            }
            
            generateColorPalette(baseColor) {
                const palettes = {
                    '#ff0000': ['#ff0000', '#ff4444', '#ff8888', '#ffaaaa', '#ffff00'],
                    '#00ff00': ['#00ff00', '#44ff44', '#88ff88', '#aaffaa', '#ffff00'],
                    '#0088ff': ['#0088ff', '#44aaff', '#88ccff', '#aaddff', '#ffffff'],
                    '#ff00ff': ['#ff00ff', '#ff44ff', '#ff88ff', '#ffaaff', '#ffff00'],
                    '#ffff00': ['#ffff00', '#ffff44', '#ffff88', '#ffffaa', '#ffffff'],
                    '#ff8800': ['#ff8800', '#ffaa44', '#ffcc88', '#ffddaa', '#ffff00'],
                    '#00ffff': ['#00ffff', '#44ffff', '#88ffff', '#aaffff', '#ffffff']
                };
                
                return palettes[baseColor] || palettes['#ff8800'];
            }
            
            update() {
                if (!this.exploded) {
                    this.rocket.update();
                    if (this.rocket.y <= this.targetY || this.rocket.vy >= 0) {
                        this.explode();
                    }
                } else {
                    this.particles = this.particles.filter(particle => {
                        particle.update();
                        return !particle.isDead();
                    });
                }
            }
            
            draw() {
                if (!this.exploded) {
                    this.rocket.draw();
                } else {
                    this.particles.forEach(particle => particle.draw());
                }
            }
            
            isDead() {
                return this.exploded && this.particles.length === 0;
            }
        }
        
        const fireworks = [];
        const colors = ['#ff0000', '#00ff00', '#0088ff', '#ff00ff', '#ffff00', '#ff8800', '#00ffff'];
        const patterns = ['sphere', 'ring', 'heart', 'star', 'willow'];
        
        function launchFirework() {
            const x = Math.random() * width;
            const targetY = Math.random() * height * 0.5 + height * 0.1;
            const color = colors[Math.floor(Math.random() * colors.length)];
            const pattern = patterns[Math.floor(Math.random() * patterns.length)];
            
            fireworks.push(new Firework(x, targetY, color, pattern));
        }
        
        // Launch initial fireworks
        for (let i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
            setTimeout(() => launchFirework(), i * 500);
        }
        
        // Continue launching fireworks automatically
        setInterval(() => {
            if (Math.random() > 0.3) {
                launchFirework();
            }
        }, 1500);
        
        // Occasional bursts
        setInterval(() => {
            const burstCount = Math.floor(Math.random() * 3) + 2;
            for (let i = 0; i < burstCount; i++) {
                setTimeout(() => launchFirework(), i * 200);
            }
        }, 8000);
        
        // Animation loop
        function animate() {
            ctx.fillStyle = 'rgba(10, 14, 39, 0.1)';
            ctx.fillRect(0, 0, width, height);
            
            // Update and draw fireworks
            for (let i = fireworks.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
                fireworks[i].update();
                fireworks[i].draw();
                
                if (fireworks[i].isDead()) {
                    fireworks.splice(i, 1);
                }
            }
            
            requestAnimationFrame(animate);
        }
        
        animate();
    </script>
</body>
</html>

<html>
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<title></title>
<style>
    html, body {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        overflow: hidden;
        background: radial-gradient(ellipse at bottom, #020111 0%, #000000 60%);
    }
    body {
        display: flex;
        align-items: stretch;
        justify-content: stretch;
    }
    canvas {
        display: block;
        flex: 1 1 auto;
        width: 100vw;
        height: 100vh;
    }
</style>
</head>
<body>
<canvas id="fireworks"></canvas>
<script>
(function () {
    const canvas = document.getElementById('fireworks');
    const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');

    let cw = window.innerWidth;
    let ch = window.innerHeight;
    let dpr = window.devicePixelRatio || 1;

    function resizeCanvas() {
        cw = window.innerWidth;
        ch = window.innerHeight;
        dpr = window.devicePixelRatio || 1;

        canvas.width = cw * dpr;
        canvas.height = ch * dpr;

        ctx.setTransform(dpr, 0, 0, dpr, 0, 0);
    }

    resizeCanvas();
    window.addEventListener('resize', resizeCanvas);

    const fireworks = [];
    const particles = [];

    const GRAVITY = 0.06;
    const PARTICLE_GRAVITY = 0.045;
    const FRICTION = 0.98;
    const PARTICLE_FRICTION = 0.96;
    const PARTICLE_COUNT_BASE = 80;
    const PARTICLE_SPEED = 6;
    const MAX_FIREWORKS = 8;
    const TRAIL_LENGTH = 5;

    function rand(min, max) {
        return Math.random() * (max - min) + min;
    }

    function randInt(min, max) {
        return Math.floor(rand(min, max));
    }

    function Firework(sx, sy, tx, ty, colorHue) {
        this.x = sx;
        this.y = sy;
        this.sx = sx;
        this.sy = sy;
        this.tx = tx;
        this.ty = ty;

        const angle = Math.atan2(ty - sy, tx - sx);
        const speed = rand(5, 8);
        this.vx = Math.cos(angle) * speed;
        this.vy = Math.sin(angle) * speed;

        this.targetRadius = 3;
        this.hue = colorHue;
        this.brightness = rand(60, 90);
        this.alpha = 1;

        this.trail = [];
        this.trailLength = TRAIL_LENGTH;
        while (this.trail.length < this.trailLength) {
            this.trail.push({ x: this.x, y: this.y });
        }

        this.distanceToTarget = 0;
        this.distanceTraveled = 0;
        this.calculateDistance();
    }

    Firework.prototype.calculateDistance = function() {
        const dx = this.tx - this.sx;
        const dy = this.ty - this.sy;
        this.distanceToTarget = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
    };

    Firework.prototype.update = function(index) {
        this.trail.pop();
        this.trail.unshift({ x: this.x, y: this.y });

        this.targetRadius += 0.15;
        if (this.targetRadius > 5) {
            this.targetRadius = 3;
        }

        this.vy += GRAVITY * -0.25;

        this.x += this.vx;
        this.y += this.vy;

        const dx = this.x - this.sx;
        const dy = this.y - this.sy;
        this.distanceTraveled = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);

        const reachedTarget = this.distanceTraveled >= this.distanceToTarget - 10 || this.vy >= 0;

        if (reachedTarget || this.y <= ch * 0.1) {
            this.explode();
            fireworks.splice(index, 1);
        }
    };

    Firework.prototype.explode = function() {
        const count = PARTICLE_COUNT_BASE + randInt(-20, 40);
        const shellType = Math.random();

        if (shellType < 0.2) {
            for (let i = 0; i < count; i++) {
                particles.push(new Particle(this.x, this.y, this.hue + rand(-10, 10), 'ring', i, count));
            }
        } else if (shellType < 0.4) {
            for (let i = 0; i < count; i++) {
                particles.push(new Particle(this.x, this.y, this.hue + rand(-20, 20), 'flower', i, count));
            }
        } else {
            for (let i = 0; i < count; i++) {
                particles.push(new Particle(this.x, this.y, this.hue + rand(-15, 15), 'burst', i, count));
            }
        }
    };

    Firework.prototype.draw = function() {
        ctx.beginPath();
        const lastTrail = this.trail[this.trail.length - 1];
        ctx.moveTo(lastTrail.x, lastTrail.y);
        ctx.lineTo(this.x, this.y);
        ctx.strokeStyle = 'hsl(' + this.hue + ',100%,' + this.brightness + '%)';
        ctx.lineWidth = 2;
        ctx.stroke();

        ctx.beginPath();
        ctx.arc(this.tx, this.ty, this.targetRadius, 0, Math.PI * 2);
        ctx.strokeStyle = 'hsla(' + this.hue + ',100%,' + this.brightness + '%,' + (this.targetRadius / 5) + ')';
        ctx.lineWidth = 1;
        ctx.stroke();
    };

    function Particle(x, y, hue, type, index, total) {
        this.x = x;
        this.y = y;
        this.hue = hue;
        this.brightness = rand(50, 90);
        this.alpha = 1;
        this.decay = rand(0.008, 0.02);
        this.type = type;
        this.size = rand(1.5, 3.2);

        let angle, speed, spread;

        if (type === 'ring') {
            angle = (Math.PI * 2 * index) / total;
            speed = PARTICLE_SPEED * 0.65;
            this.vx = Math.cos(angle) * speed;
            this.vy = Math.sin(angle) * speed;
        } else if (type === 'flower') {
            angle = (Math.PI * 2 * index) / total;
            spread = (Math.random() > 0.5 ? 1 : 0.5) * PARTICLE_SPEED;
            speed = spread * (0.7 + Math.random() * 0.6);
            this.vx = Math.cos(angle) * speed * rand(0.6, 1.0);
            this.vy = Math.sin(angle) * speed * rand(0.6, 1.0);
        } else {
            angle = rand(0, Math.PI * 2);
            speed = rand(PARTICLE_SPEED * 0.4, PARTICLE_SPEED * 1.1);
            this.vx = Math.cos(angle) * speed;
            this.vy = Math.sin(angle) * speed;
        }

        this.friction = PARTICLE_FRICTION - rand(0, 0.02);
        this.gravity = PARTICLE_GRAVITY + rand(0, 0.02);

        this.trail = [];
        this.trailLength = randInt(5, 10);
        while (this.trail.length < this.trailLength) {
            this.trail.push({ x: this.x, y: this.y });
        }
    }

    Particle.prototype.update = function(index) {
        this.trail.pop();
        this.trail.unshift({ x: this.x, y: this.y });

        this.vx *= this.friction;
        this.vy *= this.friction;
        this.vy += this.gravity;

        this.x += this.vx;
        this.y += this.vy;

        this.alpha -= this.decay;
        if (this.alpha <= this.decay || this.size <= 0.2 || this.x < -50 || this.x > cw + 50 || this.y > ch + 50) {
            particles.splice(index, 1);
        }
    };

    Particle.prototype.draw = function() {
        const lastTrail = this.trail[this.trail.length - 1];

        ctx.beginPath();
        ctx.moveTo(lastTrail.x, lastTrail.y);
        ctx.lineTo(this.x, this.y);
        ctx.strokeStyle = 'hsla(' + this.hue + ',100%,' + this.brightness + '%,' + (this.alpha * 0.4) + ')';
        ctx.lineWidth = this.size;
        ctx.stroke();

        ctx.beginPath();
        ctx.arc(this.x, this.y, this.size, 0, Math.PI * 2);
        ctx.fillStyle = 'hsla(' + this.hue + ',100%,' + this.brightness + '%,' + this.alpha + ')';
        ctx.fill();
    };

    let lastTime = 0;
    let timer = 0;
    let interval = 700;
    let hueBase = 0;

    function loop(timestamp) {
        if (!lastTime) lastTime = timestamp;
        const delta = timestamp - lastTime;
        lastTime = timestamp;
        timer += delta;

        ctx.globalCompositeOperation = 'destination-out';
        ctx.fillStyle = 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.18)';
        ctx.fillRect(0, 0, cw, ch);
        ctx.globalCompositeOperation = 'lighter';

        hueBase += 0.2;

        if (timer >= interval) {
            timer = 0;
            interval = rand(350, 900);

            const launchCount = randInt(1, 3);
            for (let i = 0; i < launchCount; i++) {
                if (fireworks.length > MAX_FIREWORKS) break;

                const sx = cw * rand(0.15, 0.85);
                const sy = ch + 10;
                const tx = cw * rand(0.1, 0.9);
                const ty = ch * rand(0.15, 0.45);
                const hue = (hueBase + rand(-40, 40)) % 360;

                fireworks.push(new Firework(sx, sy, tx, ty, hue));
            }
        }

        fireworks.forEach(function(fw, index) {
            fw.update(index);
            fw.draw();
        });

        particles.forEach(function(p, index) {
            p.update(index);
            p.draw();
        });

        requestAnimationFrame(loop);
    }

    requestAnimationFrame(loop);
})();
</script>
</body>
</html>
